alternatives: when new vulnerabilities are identified and reported

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Update the system vulnerabilities to be scanned {{ ra-5.2_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Due to the complexity of modern software, systems, and other factors, new vulnerabilities are discovered on a regular basis. It is important that newly discovered vulnerabilities are added to the list of vulnerabilities to be scanned to ensure that the organization can take steps to mitigate those vulnerabilities in a timely manner.
